parameters.name: Align
parameters.description:
The width or height with which the input images must align. Valid values: 1 to 4096. Unit: px.

*   If you set **Direction** to `vertical`, this parameter specifies the width with which the input images must align.
*   If you set **Direction** to `horizontal`, this parameter specifies the height with which the input images must align.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the width or height of the first input image is used.

parameters.name: BackgroundColor
parameters.description: The padding color of the spaces specified by `Padding` and `Margin`. Colors encoded in the `#FFFFFF` format and colors that are related to preset keywords such as `red` and `alpha` are supported.

parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description: The authorization chain settings. For more information, see [Use authorization chains to access resources of other entities](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The splicing method. Valid values:

*   vertical (default): All input images are vertically aligned and have the same width.
*   horizontal: All input images are horizontally aligned and have the same height.

parameters.name: ImageFormat
parameters.description:
The compression format of the output image. Valid values:

*   jpg (default)
*   png
*   webp

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.description: The empty space or border around the edges of the output image. Default value: 0. Unit: px.

parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description: The notification settings. For information about the asynchronous notification format, see [Asynchronous message examples](~~2743997~~).

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.description: The space between component images in the output image. Default value: 0. Unit: px.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. You can obtain the name of the project from the response of the [CreateProject](~~478153~~) operation.

parameters.name: Quality
parameters.description: The compression quality of the output image. This parameter takes effect only for JPG and WebP images. Valid values: 0 to 100. Default value: 80.

parameters.name: ScaleType
parameters.description:
The scaling mode of the input images that are vertically or horizontally aligned. Valid values:

*   fit (default): Input images are scaled proportionally, and black edges are not retained.
*   stretch: Input images are stretched to fill the space.
*   horizon: Input images are horizontally stretched.
*   vertical: Input images are vertically stretched.

parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: The input images. The images are sliced in the order of the input image URIs.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The custom tags. You can search for or filter asynchronous tasks by custom tag.

parameters.name: TargetURI
parameters.description:
The OSS bucket in which you want to store the output image.

Specify the value in the oss://${bucketname}/${objectname} format. ${bucketname} specifies the name of the OSS bucket that resides in the same region as the current project. ${objectname} specifies the path to the output image.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The user data, which is returned as asynchronous notifications to help manage notifications within your system. The maximum length of the user data is 2,048 bytes.
